name: Passport
procedure: Register on the Passport Seva Online Portal at https://passportindia.gov.in/
Log in and click 'Apply for Fresh Passport/Re-issue of Passport'
Fill in the required details in Form 1 for fresh passport application
Upload scanned copies of required documents (photograph, signature, and supporting documents)
Click the 'Pay and Schedule Appointment' link to pay fees online and schedule an appointment at Passport Seva Kendra (PSK)
Print the application receipt containing the Application Reference Number (ARN)
Visit the Passport Seva Kendra (PSK) on the date of your appointment with original documents and fee receipt for biometric data capture and document verification
documents_required: Proof of Identity: Aadhaar Card, Voter ID, PAN Card, Driving License, or other government-issued photo ID
Proof of Present Address: Aadhaar Card, Voter ID, Utility Bills (electricity/gas/water), Bank Statement, or Rental Agreement (not older than 3 months)
Proof of Date of Birth: Birth Certificate issued by Municipal Authority/Registrar of Births & Deaths, School Leaving Certificate, Aadhaar Card, or PAN Card
For applicants born after 26th January 1989: Birth Certificate is mandatory
Recent passport-sized photographs with white background (2 copies)
Self-attested photocopies of all original documents

name: PAN Card
procedure: Visit the official Income Tax e-filing portal at https://www.incometax.gov.in/ for instant e-PAN (free for eligible applicants) OR visit NSDL portal at https://tin.tin.nsdl.com/pan/ or UTIITSL portal at https://www.pan.utiitsl.com/
For instant e-PAN: Click on 'Instant e-PAN' and enter Aadhaar number for OTP-based verification
For regular PAN: Select 'New PAN for Indian Citizens (Form 49A)' option
Fill out the application form with personal details including name, date of birth, address, and contact information
Select document submission mode: Paperless (Aadhaar e-KYC), Digital upload, or Physical submission
Upload scanned copies of required documents and photograph
Make online payment through credit/debit card, net banking, or demand draft
Download and print the acknowledgment receipt with 15-digit acknowledgment number
For physical submission: Send documents to NSDL/UTIITSL office within 15 days
documents_required: Proof of Identity: Aadhaar Card, Voter ID, Passport, Driving License, or Government-issued photo ID
Proof of Address: Aadhaar Card, Passport, Utility Bills (electricity/telephone/water), Bank Statement, or Rental Agreement
Proof of Date of Birth: Birth Certificate, Aadhaar Card, Passport, Matriculation Certificate, or School Leaving Certificate
Recent passport-sized color photograph with white background
For Instant e-PAN: Valid Aadhaar with linked mobile number (mandatory)

name: Aadhaar Card
procedure: Locate your nearest Aadhaar Enrolment Center using https://appointments.uidai.gov.in/ or visit any authorized center
Carry original documents for identity, address, and date of birth proof
Fill the Aadhaar enrolment form (available at the center) with personal details
Submit the form along with original documents for verification by the operator
Provide biometric data: 10 fingerprints, iris scan of both eyes, and facial photograph
Review the captured information and make corrections if needed during enrolment
Collect the acknowledgment slip containing the 14-digit Enrolment ID (EID)
Your Aadhaar card will be mailed to your registered address within 60-90 days, or download e-Aadhaar from https://myaadhaar.uidai.gov.in/
documents_required: Proof of Identity (any one): Passport, PAN Card, Voter ID, Driving License, Ration Card with photograph, or Government-issued photo ID
Proof of Address (any one): Passport, Voter ID, Ration Card, Bank Statement, Utility Bills (electricity/water/gas/telephone - not older than 3 months), or Rental Agreement
Proof of Date of Birth (any one): Birth Certificate, Passport, PAN Card, School Leaving Certificate/SSLC, or Matriculation Certificate
For children: Birth Certificate is mandatory if born after 1st October 2023
For Head of Family (HoF) based enrolment: Relationship proof documents if individual lacks required documents

name: Driving License
procedure: Apply for Learner's License online at https://sarathi.parivahan.gov.in/ by selecting your state and filling Form 2
Upload required documents and pay the LL fee online
Take the online/offline test on traffic rules and road signs at RTO
After passing the test, collect your Learner's License (valid for 6 months)
Wait for mandatory 30 days after getting LL before applying for permanent DL
Apply for permanent Driving License online using Form 4 on the same portal
Upload documents and pay DL fees online
Book a slot for practical driving test at RTO
Visit RTO on scheduled date with original documents and LL for driving test
Pass the practical driving test conducted by RTO officials to receive permanent DL
documents_required: Proof of Age (any one): Birth Certificate, PAN Card, Passport, School Leaving Certificate/10th Marksheet with DOB, or Aadhaar Card
Proof of Address (any one): Aadhaar Card, Voter ID, Ration Card, Passport, Utility Bills (electricity/water/gas), or Bank Statement
Form 2 (for Learner's License) and Form 4 (for permanent DL) - filled online or offline
Recent passport-sized photographs (3-6 copies)
Medical Certificate (Form 1A) - mandatory for transport vehicles and applicants above 40 years
Learner's License (mandatory when applying for permanent DL)
Driving School Certificate (if applicable)

name: Voter ID
procedure: Visit the Voters' Services Portal at https://voters.eci.gov.in/ or your state's Chief Electoral Officer website
Register as a new user with mobile number and email ID, or login if already registered
Fill out Form 6 (Application for inclusion of name in electoral roll) with personal details
Upload recent passport-sized color photograph with white background
Upload scanned copies of required documents for identity, address, and age proof
Submit the online application and note down the reference number for tracking
A Booth Level Officer (BLO) will visit your address for field verification within 15-30 days
Once verified and approved, your Voter ID card will be dispatched to your registered address
Download e-EPIC (electronic voter ID) from the portal after approval
documents_required: Proof of Identity (any one): Aadhaar Card, PAN Card, Passport, Driving License, Ration Card with photo, or Bank Passbook with photo
Proof of Address (any one): Aadhaar Card, Passport, Driving License, Utility Bills (electricity/water/gas/telephone), Bank Statement, or Rental Agreement
Proof of Age (any one): Birth Certificate, Aadhaar Card, PAN Card, Passport, 10th Standard Marksheet/Certificate, or School Leaving Certificate
Recent passport-sized color photograph with white background
Self-attested photocopies of all supporting documents
eligibility : Minimum Age: 18 years on or before qualifying date, Citizenship: Indian citizen, Residency: Ordinarily resident of the constituency where applying
